sprint.name: Daily Logging & Reports
sprint.description: Implement daily milk production logging with full offline support, and report viewing/downloading functionality.

user_stories.title: Log Daily Milk Production
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to log my cow's daily milk production to track performance.

tasks.title: Create milk log page
tasks.description: Build page for logging daily milk production.

tasks.title: Build cow selector
tasks.description: Dropdown to select cow for logging.

tasks.title: Build date picker
tasks.description: Date input defaulting to today, allowing past dates.

tasks.title: Build morning/evening yield inputs
tasks.description: Numeric inputs for morning and evening milk yield in liters.

tasks.title: Build notes field
tasks.description: Optional textarea for notes about the day.

tasks.title: Submit to daily logs API
tasks.description: POST to /bot-daily-logs/ endpoint.

tasks.title: Implement offline logging
tasks.description: Queue logs locally when offline with auto-sync.

tasks.title: Show daily total
tasks.description: Calculate and display morning + evening total.

acceptance_criteria: Can enter morning and evening milk yield
Works fully offline with sync indicator

user_stories.title: View Milk Log History
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to see past milk production logs to track trends.

tasks.title: Create logs history page
tasks.description: Build page showing list of milk logs.

tasks.title: Create log entry card
tasks.description: Card showing date, cow, yields, total.

tasks.title: Implement date range filter
tasks.description: Filter logs by date range (last 7 days, last month, custom).

tasks.title: Implement cow filter
tasks.description: Filter logs by specific cow.

tasks.title: Show summary statistics
tasks.description: Display average, total, min, max for filtered period.

acceptance_criteria: Shows all logs in chronological order
Can filter by date range and cow
Summary stats show for filtered data

user_stories.title: Edit Milk Log
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to correct a milk log entry if I made a mistake.

tasks.title: Add edit option to log cards
tasks.description: Add edit button/swipe action to log entries.

tasks.title: Create edit log form
tasks.description: Reuse log form with pre-populated values.

tasks.title: Submit update API
tasks.description: PUT to /bot-daily-logs/{log_id}.

tasks.title: Handle offline edits
tasks.description: Queue edits for sync.

user_stories.title: Quick Log Widget
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want a quick way to log milk from the home screen.

tasks.title: Create home page quick log widget
tasks.description: Card on home page for quick milk logging.

tasks.title: Show pending entries
tasks.description: Show cows that haven't been logged today.

tasks.title: Quick entry form
tasks.description: Compact form for logging without leaving home page.

test_cases.title: Quick Log
test_cases.expected_result: Log saved without leaving home page

user_stories.title: View Diet Reports
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to view saved diet reports so I can reference them.

tasks.title: Create reports list page
tasks.description: Build page showing saved diet reports.

tasks.title: Fetch reports from API
tasks.description: GET from /pdf-reports/{user_id}.

tasks.title: Create report card
tasks.description: Card showing report name, cow, date, actions.

tasks.title: Cache report metadata
tasks.description: Store report list locally for offline browsing.

acceptance_criteria: Can navigate to view full report

user_stories.title: Download/Share Report
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to download or share a diet report.

tasks.title: Add download button
tasks.description: Button to download PDF report.

tasks.title: Implement PDF download
tasks.description: Fetch PDF from /pdf-report/{report_id}/{user_id} and trigger download.

tasks.title: Add share button
tasks.description: Use Web Share API to share report.

tasks.title: Handle share fallback
tasks.description: Fall back to copy link if Web Share not supported.

user_stories.title: Generate New Report
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to generate a PDF report from a diet optimization.

tasks.title: Add 'Save as Report' action
tasks.description: Button on diet results to save as PDF report.

tasks.title: Call generate PDF API
tasks.description: POST to /generate-pdf-report/ with diet data.

tasks.title: Show generation progress
tasks.description: Loading indicator while PDF generates.

tasks.title: Navigate to report after creation
tasks.description: Take user to report view after successful generation.

acceptance_criteria: Can save diet results as PDF report

sprint_goals: Full milk logging with offline support
definition_of_done: Share functionality works on supported platforms
